H3.text: who was the leader of soviet union during wwii. Joseph Stalin

A4.text: Joseph Vissarionovich Stalin (né Dzhugashvili; 18 December [O.S. 6 December] 1878 – 5 March 1953) was a Soviet revolutionary and politician who led the Soviet Union from 1924 until his death in 1953.

A5.text: He held office as General Secretary of the Communist Party from 1922 to 1952 and as premier from 1941 until his death.
